conversation.event: <0>condition</0> <1>_root.player.playerStatus.12</1> <2>2</2> <3>goto</3> <4>3</4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, that was quite an outburst, was it not?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>condition</0> <1>_root.conversation.second</1> <2>true</2> <3>goto</3> <4>10</4>
<0>speech</0> <1>What brings you to this sorry neck of Po Metru?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I was wondering if you could tell me about this place.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, I suppose I could. Welcome to pumping station 12B.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Hello again. Did you forget everything, or are you just curious?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>decision</0> <1>Listen to description again?</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>condition</0> <1>_root.conversation.decision</1> <2>no</2> <3>goto</3> <4>24</4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Go ahead; tell me about it again.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>We pump protodermis from deep under the ground.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Then we ship it to Ga Metru, where it is purified.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>In principle; really, we haven't had much luck lately.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>All over the place, pumping stations have been drying up.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Is that what those metal pumps are?</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Yes, you can go ahead and play around with those.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>We're not getting much out of the ground anyway.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, I wish you the best of luck.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Very kind of you. I appreciate it.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>That's all right, I'll pass.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I certainly can't blame you.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
